channel.title: Client backround
channel.description:
First I need to know how to make the backround in the first place.. I heard they were easy... but if someone could make one for me i might give staff on my server bt if u dont want staff how abt free :D?
Second: were do i put the new backround in and take out the old?

item.title: Client backround
item.dc:creator: @Cancel Cancel
item.description:
@Cancel wrote:

WELL first off, search your source and find the previous client backround, sometimes its in the sprites but your gonna have to do a bit of searching. next, find the picture you want, say u want one from Rs website, right click the picture and copy it. next go into your client folder and find the picture. next, “open with” paint. the backround you want to change should be on the screen. like i said, cop the picture you want and paste it over the picture and resize it to fit the client picture. use the prviouse picture size to help you measure. so it’s basicly just your picture covering the old one. save, compile the client and try it xD hope it helped.

Oh and if you wish to edit the picture, simply just edit it with paint, good luck!!

Read full topic
